Notes.Text:
This update fixes a DoS vulnerability in bind when handling malformed 
NSEC3-signed zones. CVE-2014-0591 has been assigned to this issue.

Security Issue references:

    * CVE-2014-0591
      <http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvename.cgi?name=CVE-2014-0591>
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: The query_findclosestnsec3 function in query.c in named in ISC BIND 9.6, 9.7, and 9.8 before 9.8.6-P2 and 9.9 before 9.9.4-P2, and 9.6-ESV before 9.6-ESV-R10-P2, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (INSIST assertion failure and daemon exit) via a crafted DNS query to an authoritative nameserver that uses the NSEC3 signing feature.
